analysis.key_quote: I strongly oppose this proposed rule. I have just been learning about the spoils system from my son as he studied it in AP US History, and have no desire to take us back to the late 1800s.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule and expresses concerns about the return to a spoils system, which indicates a strong stance against politicization of the civil service. Additionally, it emphasizes the need for protections for federal workers, aligning with merit-based system concerns.
